channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- System x
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- System x

item.title: CVE-2020-8332|2024-08-04T09:56:28.331Z -- lenovo -- system%20x
item.description: A potential vulnerability in the SMI callback function used in the legacy BIOS mode USB drivers in some legacy Lenovo and IBM System x servers may allow arbitrary code execution. Servers operating in UEFI mode are not affected.

item.title: CVE-2019-6157|2024-08-04T20:16:24.517Z -- lenovo -- system%20x
item.description: In various firmware versions of Lenovo System x, the integrated management module II (IMM2)'s first failure data capture (FFDC) includes the web server's private key in the generated log file for support.
